# DataAI Project Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
  - Full-stack AI-powered data analysis platform
  - Next.js 14 with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Prisma, PostgreSQL
  - Features: chat, notebooks, file management, data connectors, visualizations

- [x] Scaffold the Project
  - Created Next.js 14 project structure manually
  - Set up package.json with all dependencies
  - Configured TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, PostCSS
  - Created Prisma schema with complete database models
  - Set up folder structure: app/, components/, lib/, prisma/, services/

- [ ] Customize the Project

- [ ] Install Required Extensions

- [ ] Compile the Project

- [ ] Create and Run Task

- [ ] Launch the Project

- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete
